text: Something I love about exploring Meteora

are all the high lookout points that you
can do to explore and see the city of Kalabaka

behind me
I think it’s one of the most beautiful city

settings on earth
having these gorgeous stone pillars just jutting

and you can do this by car, by foot, by bicycle,
by scooter

you just have to make sure you come to the
high lookouts

If you’re a Game of Thrones fan
you’ll definitely recognize this view

So when you come to Greece
make sure that you add Meteora to your itinerary

it’s got beautiful views, amazing food,
and great history and culture
